functions.name: proxy
functions.description:
Proxy function

⭐ ELITE: Enhanced proxy with analytics background tasks
Note: Using custom implementation because domain-core proxy is too simple
for analytics background tasks. This follows KISS - keep it simple but functional.

Validates incoming requests and applies security checks.
Returns early with 400 error if request structure is invalid.

Following Next.js 16 best practices:
- Runs at Edge Runtime by default (faster, closer to users)
- Validates request structure before processing
- Excludes static assets and Next.js internals via matcher

functions.description:
MANDATORY: Create enum schema with required patterns

functions.description:
MANDATORY: Safe parse wrapper

functions.name: createMandatoryRecord
functions.description:

Zod v4 requires both key and value schemas for z.record()
Key must be a string-compatible schema (ZodString, ZodEnum, etc.)

functions.description:
Enforce global config security policies

Vanguard Security: Ensures audit_trail_immutable is always true

functions.name: parseUserConfig
functions.description: Validate and parse user configuration

functions.name: parseGlobalConfig
functions.description: Validate and parse global configuration with security enforcement

functions.name: safeParseUserConfig
functions.description: Safe parse user configuration (non-throwing)

functions.name: safeParseGlobalConfig
functions.description: Safe parse global configuration with security enforcement (non-throwing)

functions.name: mergeUserConfig
functions.description:
Merge user customization with global defaults

User preferences take precedence over global defaults

functions.name: useStencilForm
functions.description: Hook for managing stencil-based forms with React Hook Form + Zod

functions.name: getDefaultValues
functions.description: Get default values for a stencil form

functions.name: useValidatedFormAction
functions.description:
Hook for validated form actions

Wraps a server action with Zod validation for form inputs.
Provides type-safe form handling with validation errors.

functions.name: formDataToObject
functions.description:
Helper to convert FormData to object with proper types

Handles multi-value fields and type coercion.

functions.name: validateCustomization
functions.description: Validate frontend customization

functions.name: mergeCustomization
functions.description:
Merge user customization with global defaults

User preferences take precedence over global defaults

functions.name: safeParseCustomization
functions.description: Safe parse customization (non-throwing)

functions.name: calculateMetrics
functions.description: Calculate dashboard metrics from proposals

functions.name: calculateAverageDecisionTime
functions.description: Calculate average decision time in days

functions.name: useProposals
functions.description: Fetch proposals list

functions.name: useProposal
functions.description: Fetch single proposal

functions.name: useApproveProposal
functions.description: Approve proposal mutation with optimistic updates

functions.name: useVetoProposal
functions.description: Veto proposal mutation with optimistic updates

functions.name: createBroadcastCreatedMessage
functions.description: Create broadcast_created WebSocket message

functions.name: createBroadcastUpdatedMessage
functions.description: Create broadcast_updated WebSocket message

functions.name: createBroadcastReadMessage
functions.description: Create broadcast_read WebSocket message

functions.name: emitBroadcastEvent
functions.description:
Emit broadcast event to WebSocket clients

In production, this would send the message to all connected clients
matching the broadcast audience. For now, this is a placeholder that
logs the event.

functions.name: useBroadcastWebSocket
functions.description:
WebSocket hook for broadcast events

In production, this would connect to a WebSocket server.
For now, it's a placeholder that can be extended when WebSocket
infrastructure is available.

functions.name: validateWebSocketMessage
functions.description: Validate WebSocket message

functions.name: handleWebSocketMessage
functions.description:
Handle WebSocket message

Validates message and processes it

functions.name: validateWebSocketConnection
functions.description: Validate WebSocket connection

functions.name: createWebSocketMessage
functions.description:
Create WebSocket message

Helper to create validated WebSocket messages

functions.name: encryptDocument
functions.description:
Encrypt a document

Validates all inputs and outputs with Zod schemas

functions.name: decryptDocument
functions.description:
Decrypt a document

Validates decryption request and encrypted data with Zod schemas

functions.name: validateEncryptionKey
functions.description: Validate encryption key

functions.name: validateEncryptedData
functions.description: Validate encrypted data

functions.name: validateDecryptionRequest
functions.description: Validate decryption request

functions.name: validateActionResponse
functions.description:
Validate action response

Generic helper to validate any action response against a schema.

functions.name: createFieldSchema
functions.description: Create a Zod schema for a single stencil field

functions.name: applyValidationRule
functions.description: Apply validation rules from string format (e.g., "min:50000|max:500000")

functions.name: createStencilSchema
functions.description:
Create a Zod schema from a stencil definition

Generates a schema that validates proposal data against the stencil's fields.

functions.name: validateProposalDataWithZod
functions.description:
Validate proposal data against a stencil using Zod

Returns a result object with validation status and errors.
